zh: 魔鬼摧毁了广岛和长崎。

en: Roy looked solemn as I told him the story.
zh: 当我告诉罗伊这个故事时，他看起来很严肃。

en: The bad smell disgusted us.
zh: 那股难闻的气味让我们感到厌恶。

en: The wicked man is scared of heights.
zh: 那个邪恶的人恐高。

en: On hearing the bad news, she burst into tears.
zh: 听到这个坏消息，她 burst into tears (直译为“她突然哭了起来”，更自然的说法是：她一下子哭了出来).

en: Are you ready to hear the bad news?
zh: 你准备好听坏消息了吗？

en: The bad news is only too true.
zh: 这个坏消息是真的。

en: The patriot sticks to his moral principles.
zh: 爱国者坚持他的道德原则。

en: Her heart ached for the poor child.
zh: 她的心为那个可怜的孩子感到难过。

en: The pitiful tale fetched tears from the girl.
zh: 那个可怜的故事让那个女孩流下了眼泪。

en: The eagle spread its wings ready for flight.
zh: 老鹰展开翅膀准备起飞。

en: The young man put out his hand and I shook it.
zh: 那个年轻人伸出手，我和他握了握。

en: You must be careful with the wine glass.
zh: 你必须小心那个酒杯。

en: The word processor is easy for us to use.
zh: 这个文字处理器对我们来说很容易使用。

en: This word-processor is very convenient.
zh: 这个文字处理器非常方便。

en: The word processor has saved me much time.
zh: 这个文字处理器为我节省了很多时间。

en: The robot made its way toward him.
zh: 那个机器人朝他走去。

en: That robot came in handy for many things.
zh: 那个机器人在很多事情上都派上了用场。

en: The robot does whatever its master tells it to do.
zh: 机器人会做它的主人让它做的任何事。

en: When the rock singer appeared on the stage, the audience at the concert clapped loudly.
zh: 当摇滚歌手出现在舞台上时，演唱会的观众大声鼓掌。

en: The rock star is an idol of the teenagers.
zh: 那个摇滚明星是青少年的偶像。

en: The loan carries 5.5% interest.
zh: 这笔贷款的利率是5.5%。

en: The rope wasn't strong enough to support him.
zh: 那根绳子不够结实，无法支撑他。

en: Those candles burned the table.
zh: 那些蜡烛烧坏了桌子。

en: Finishing the report by tomorrow is next to impossible.
zh: 明天完成报告几乎是不可能的。

en: The reporter learned about war first hand.
zh: 那个记者亲身了解了战争。

en: The wrestler had his right leg broken in a bout.
zh: 那个摔跤手在比赛中右腿骨折。

en: The wrestler has a formidable grip.
zh: 那个摔跤手有着可怕的握力。

en: The restaurant goes its own way.
zh: 那家餐厅走自己的路。

en: The wrestler weighs over 200 kilograms.
zh: 那个摔跤手体重超过200公斤。

en: The restaurant doesn't do lunch.
zh: 那家餐厅不提供午餐。

en: You will find the restaurant on your right.
zh: 你会发现那家餐厅在你的右边。

en: The restaurant is a pleasant out-of-the-way spot in New York.
zh: 那家餐厅是纽约一个令人愉快的偏僻之地。

en: That restaurant has a very nice atmosphere.
zh: 那家餐厅的气氛非常好。

en: That restaurant usually serves good food at lower prices.
zh: 那家餐厅通常以较低的价格提供美味的食物。

en: The restaurant gave us perfect service.
zh: 那家餐厅为我们提供了完美的服务。

en: The restaurant stands at the junction of two superhighways.
zh: 这家餐厅位于两条高速公路的交汇处。

en: The food the restaurant offered us was so cold and salty that it was far from satisfying.
zh: 这家餐厅提供的食物又冷又咸，远不能令人满意。

en: You can see the whole park from the restaurant.
zh: 从这家餐厅你可以看到整个公园。

en: The record concert is free of charge and is open to everyone.
zh: 这场唱片音乐会是免费的，对所有人开放。

en: Whoever wins the race will receive the prize.
zh: 无论谁赢得比赛，都将获得奖品。

en: A new team was formed in order to take part in the race.
zh: 为了参加比赛，组建了一支新的队伍。

en: Some famous foreign runners entered that race.
zh: 一些著名的外国赛跑运动员参加了那场比赛。

en: There were fifty entries for the race.
zh: 有五十人报名参加了比赛。

en: Only four horses competed in the race.
zh: 只有四匹马参加了比赛。

en: He has the lead in the race.
zh: 他在比赛中领先。

en: No less than 3 men fell in that race.
zh: 至少有三个人在那场比赛中摔倒了。

en: Will you explain the rule to me?
zh: 你能给我解释一下规则吗？

en: The apple has begun to decay.
zh: 这个苹果已经开始腐烂了。

en: That apple is bruised.
zh: 那个苹果碰伤了。

en: The apple tastes sweet.
zh: 这个苹果尝起来很甜。

en: The apple is not quite ripe yet.
zh: 这个苹果还没完全成熟。

en: The apple appeased my hunger temporarily.
zh: 这个苹果暂时缓解了我的饥饿。

en: The apple trees set very well.
zh: 这些苹果树结果很好。

en: Half of the apple was rotten.
zh: 一半的苹果都烂了。

en: Take either of the apples.
zh: 随便拿一个苹果吧。

en: The ribbon doesn't match the dress.
zh: 这条丝带和这条裙子不相配。

en: The books which are on that list will be difficult to find in Japan.
zh: 清单上的那些书在日本很难找到。

en: Add a few more names to the list.
zh: 在清单上再加几个名字。

en: Choose from this list the things you'll need on your trip.
zh: 从这份清单中选择你在旅行中需要的东西。

en: That radio is no bigger than a matchbox.
zh: 那台收音机不比火柴盒大。

en: I'll give you my typewriter in exchange for that radio.
zh: 我用我的打字机和你换那个收音机。

en: The radio announcer had a masculine voice.
zh: 那个无线电广播员的声音很有男子气概。

en: Turn that radio down at once.
zh: 立刻把收音机音量关小。

en: The yacht sailed all over the world by using the force of the wind.
zh: 那艘游艇借助风力环游世界。

en: The yacht is under smooth sail.
zh: 那艘游艇行驶得很平稳。

en: The yacht sailed round a buoy.
zh: 那艘游艇绕过了一个浮标。

en: You must not misbehave so.
zh: 你不能这么没规矩。

en: Don't look at me that way.
zh: 别那样看着我。

en: That is how he got out of danger.
zh: 他是这样脱离危险的。

en: Making such a large sale is a feather in the salesman's cap.
zh: 完成这么大一笔销售是那个销售员的荣耀。

en: It is dangerous to wield an edged tool in such a way.
zh: 那样使用锋利的工具很危险。

en: That is the regular starting time.
zh: 那是通常的开始时间。

en: Who are you that you spoke thus to me?
zh: 你是什么人，竟敢这样对我说话？

en: Do you have any grounds for thinking so?
zh: 你有什么理由这么想吗？

en: He must be a gentleman to act that way.
zh: 他一定是位绅士才会那样做。

en: That's how he escaped being hurt in the accident.
zh: 他是这样才没有在事故中受伤的。

en: That's how he invented the machine.
zh: 他是这样发明了这台机器的。

en: That is how it happened.
zh: 事情就是这样发生的。

en: That's how I got to know her.
zh: 我是这样认识她的。

en: That was why he entered the university.
zh: 那就是他进入大学的原因。

en: I cannot hear such a story without weeping.
zh: 我一听到这样的故事就忍不住要哭。

en: Have you ever heard such a story?
zh: 你听过这样的故事吗？

en: That kind of talk will get you nowhere.
zh: 那种话对你没有任何好处。

en: Such a one alone can remind us of our faults.
zh: 只有这样的人才能提醒我们自己的缺点。

en: Such a method is out of date.
zh: 这种方法已经过时了。

en: There is little, if any, of such distribution of control.
zh: 几乎不存在这种控制权的分配。

en: It cannot plausibly be argued that behaviour of such complexity derives entirely from instinct.
zh: 很难令人信服地认为如此复杂的行为完全源于本能。

en: No one knows when such a custom came into existence.
zh: 没有人知道这种习俗是什么时候出现的。

en: We must do away with such a custom.
zh: 我们必须废除这种习俗。

en: I feel nothing but contempt for such dishonest behavior.
zh: 我对这种不诚实的行为只有鄙视。

en: Such a crime cannot be despised enough.
zh: 这种罪行再怎么鄙视也不为过。

en: Making such a judgement may lead to wrong ideas.
zh: 做出这样的判断可能会导致错误的观念。

en: Was it necessary to inflict such a punishment on him?
zh: 有必要对他处以如此严厉的惩罚吗？

en: That kind of remark does not befit you.
zh: 那种话不适合你。

en: Such secrets are always eventually revealed.
zh: 这样的秘密最终总是会被揭露的。

en: There are such shops about.
zh: 附近有这样的商店。

en: It is a wonder that such a man is a policeman.
zh: 这样的人竟然是个警察，真是不可思议。

en: Such a man ought to succeed.
zh: 这样的人应该会成功的。

en: Such men count for much in the society.
zh: 这样的人在社会上举足轻重。

en: Nothing will excuse such an act.
zh: 任何理由都不能为这种行为辩解。

en: Under such circumstances, we cannot succeed.
zh: 在这种情况下，我们不可能成功。

en: Bear in mind that, under such circumstances, we have no alternative but to find another buyer.
zh: 请记住，在这种情况下，我们别无选择，只能另找买家。

en: In such a case, you can always ask a question in return.
zh: 在这种情况下，你总是可以反问一个问题。

en: Such a boy is loved by everybody.
zh: 这样的男孩人人都喜欢。

en: In such a case, restraints in fiscal policy must be brought into play.
zh: 在这种情况下，必须采取财政政策的约束。

en: Such an event is quite common here.
zh: 这样的事情在这里很常见。

en: There seems to be little agreement as to how to preserve the evidence in such cases.
zh: 在如何保存此类案件的证据方面，似乎没有什么共识。

en: It's my business to investigate such things.
zh: 调查这类事情是我的职责。

en: I am proud of having accomplished such a task.
zh: 我为完成了这样的任务而感到自豪。

en: Such magazines have a great influence on children.
zh: 这样的杂志对儿童有很大的影响。

en: The severity of such marks can reveal whether or not any of these people were habitually engaged in hard labor.
zh: 这些痕迹的严重程度可以揭示这些人是否经常从事繁重劳动。

en: Such international cooperation produced great results.
zh: 这种国际合作产生了巨大的成果。

en: People in such countries, especially the ASEAN countries, believe that the secret of Japan's remarkable economic growth is education.
zh: 这些国家的人民，特别是东盟国家的人民，认为日本经济显著增长的秘诀在于教育。

en: Such drastic economic growth cannot be sustained.
zh: 这种剧烈的经济增长是不可持续的。

en: Such conduct will give rise to suspicion.
zh: 这种行为会引起怀疑。

en: Few people can buy such an expensive car.
zh: 很少有人能买得起这么贵的车。

en: Such actions are alien to our beliefs.
zh: 这种行为与我们的信仰格格不入。

en: Such conduct doesn't fit in with your reputation.
zh: 这种行为与你的声誉不符。

en: Such behavior may bring about an accident.
zh: 这种行为可能会导致事故。

en: Such conduct does not become a gentleman.
zh: 这种行为不符合绅士风度。

en: Such behavior is just like Meg.
zh: 这种行为简直就像梅格。

en: Such conduct would subject the offender to a heavy penalty.
zh: 这种行为会使违规者受到严厉的惩罚。

en: Those ideas are alien to our way of thinking.
zh: 那些想法与我们的思维方式格格不入。

en: Hardly ever have we seen such a night!
zh: 我们几乎从未见过这样的夜晚！

en: We had better do away with such a fixed idea.
zh: 我们最好抛弃这种固定的想法。

en: Such an old car was next to useless.
zh: 这么旧的车几乎没用了。

en: It is no use making an excuse like that.
zh: 找那样的借口是没有用的。

en: You may as well leave such a decision to your daughter.
zh: 你还不如把这样的决定留给你女儿做。

en: Such an economic program will help the rich at the expense of the poor.
zh: 这样的经济计划会帮助富人，牺牲穷人的利益。

en: Such a teacher may as well retire from his work.
zh: 这样的老师还不如退休。

en: Although he was in such circumstances, he made his way by himself.
zh: 虽然他处在这样的境地，但他还是靠自己奋斗出来了。

en: Such skills could be put to many practical uses.
zh: 这样的技能可以用于许多实际用途。

en: Nobody knew what the machine was like.
zh: 没有人知道这台机器是什么样的。

en: I was stupid to make a mistake like that.
zh: 我犯这样的错误真是太蠢了。

en: You must avoid making such mistakes.
zh: 你必须避免犯这样的错误。

en: You'd better leave off such a radical idea.
zh: 你最好放弃这种激进的想法。

en: You cannot respect such a great man too much.
zh: 你再怎么尊敬这样一位伟人也不为过。

en: I object to being treated like that.
zh: 我反对那样被对待。

en: One must deplore such bad behavior.
zh: 人们必须谴责这种不良行为。

en: You should do away with such evil customs.
zh: 你应该废除这种邪恶的习俗。

en: Such trouble stems from carelessness.
zh: 这种麻烦源于粗心大意。

en: It is fortunate that you should have such a good friend.
zh: 你竟然有这么好的朋友，真是幸运。

en: It is beneath him to do something like that.
zh: 做那样的事情有损他的身份。

en: I don't care for that sort of thing.
zh: 我不喜欢那种东西。

en: Never did I dream of such a thing.
zh: 我从未梦想过这样的事情。

en: I have neither seen nor heard of such a thing.
zh: 我既没有见过也没有听说过这样的事情。

en: I'll see that it never happens again.
zh: 我会确保它不会再发生。

en: Can such a thing happen again?
zh: 这样的事情还会再次发生吗？

en: The time when such things could happen is past.
zh: 那种事情发生的时代已经过去了。

en: Do you think something like that will repeat itself?
zh: 你认为那样的事情会重演吗？

en: There were few, if any, cases.
zh: 即使有，案例也寥寥无几。

en: See to it that such a thing does not happen again.
zh: 注意不要再发生这样的事情。

en: We need to talk about how to do it.
zh: 我们需要谈谈如何做这件事。

en: The method is behind the times now.
zh: 这个方法现在已经过时了。

en: I was mixed up by the confusing explanation.
zh: 我被这令人困惑的解释搞糊涂了。

en: The mountain is not as high as Mt. Fuji.
zh: 这座山没有富士山那么高。

en: The mountain is 2000 meters above sea level.
zh: 这座山海拔2000米。

en: The gangsters let him in on their plan to knock off a rival gang leader.
zh: 歹徒让他参与了他们干掉敌对帮派头目的计划。

en: The motel can accommodate as many as 400 guests.
zh: 这家汽车旅馆最多可容纳400位客人。

en: The hen has laid an egg.
zh: 母鸡下了一个蛋。

en: The hen lays an egg almost every day.
zh: 这只母鸡几乎每天都下一个蛋。

en: The hen hatched five eggs.
zh: 这只母鸡孵出了五个蛋。

en: Cut the melon into six equal pieces.
zh: 把瓜切成六等份。

en: The melon smells sweet and tastes very nice.
zh: 这瓜闻起来很香，味道也很好。

en: He offered his congratulations on the happy occasion.
zh: 他对这个喜庆的场合表示祝贺。

en: The milk tasted bad.
zh: 这牛奶味道很糟糕。

en: The milk tasted sour.
zh: 这牛奶味道酸了。

en: The musical was far from being a success.
zh: 这部音乐剧远未成功。

en: It cost him ten dollars to get the ticket for the musical.
zh: 他花了十美元买了这部音乐剧的票。

en: We felt sorry for the error.
zh: 我们对这个错误感到遗憾。

en: The shabby compartment remained vacant.
zh: 这间破旧的车厢仍然空着。

en: The shabby flat is vacant.
zh: 这间破旧的公寓是空置的。

en: Don't tell me the end of the mystery.
zh: 不要告诉我这个谜团的结局。

en: Without the error, our team could have won the game.
zh: 如果没有这个错误，我们的队伍就能赢得比赛。

en: The orange appears rotten inside.
zh: 这个橘子看起来里面烂了。

en: I found the comic book very interesting.
zh: 我发现这本漫画书很有趣。

en: One hundred and fifty people entered the marathon race.
zh: 一百五十人参加了马拉松比赛。

en: Please hold on.
zh: 请稍等。

en: Keep straight on!
zh: 一直往前走！

en: Hold the line. I'll see if he is in.
zh: 请别挂断。我看看他是否在。

en: The town was exactly the same as before.
zh: 这个城镇和以前一模一样。

en: The volunteer group provided the villagers with water.
zh: 志愿者团体为村民们提供了水。

en: The activities of the volunteer group covered half a century.
zh: 志愿者团体的活动持续了半个世纪。

en: I couldn't bring myself to see the horror movie again.
zh: 我无法让自己再看一遍那部恐怖电影。

en: The bottle is filled with water.
zh: 瓶子里装满了水。

en: Do you know that hotel?
zh: 你知道那家酒店吗？

en: The hotel has an air of luxury.
zh: 这家酒店很有豪华气派。

en: That hotel is not all it's cracked up to be.
zh: 那家酒店名不副实。

en: The hotel is run by his uncle.
zh: 这家酒店是他叔叔经营的。

en: The hotel was designed by a Japanese architect.
zh: 这家酒店是由一位日本建筑师设计的。

en: The hotel adjoins a lake on the east.
zh: 这家酒店东边紧邻一个湖。

en: The hotel remains closed during the winter.
zh: 这家酒店在冬季仍然关闭。

en: The hotel has good accommodation.
zh: 这家酒店住宿条件很好。

en: The hotel is noted for its food.
zh: 这家酒店以其美食而闻名。

en: The hotel is at the foot of a mountain.
zh: 这家酒店位于山脚下。

en: The hotel was hard by the lake.
zh: 这家酒店紧挨着湖边。

en: The hotel was luxurious beyond description.
zh: 这家酒店的豪华程度简直无法形容。

en: The hotel has a good prospect.
zh: 这家酒店的视野很好。

en: Standing as it does on the hill the hotel commands a fine view.
zh: 这家酒店坐落在山上，视野极佳。

en: The hotel stands on a hill.
zh: 这家酒店坐落在一个小山上。

en: The hotel is within easy access of the station.
zh: 这家酒店交通便利，很容易到达车站。

en: It is admitted that the hotel is the best in this area.
zh: 人们都承认这家酒店是这个地区最好的。

en: Did that hotel meet your expectations?
zh: 那家酒店符合你的期望吗？

en: The hotel can accommodate fifty guests.
zh: 这家酒店可以容纳五十位客人。

en: The hotel can accommodate 500 guests.
zh: 这家酒店可以容纳五百位客人。

en: The hotel can accommodate 400 guests.
zh: 这家酒店可以容纳四百位客人。

en: The hotel can accommodate 300 people.
zh: 这家酒店可以容纳三百人。

en: There's a bank in front of the hotel.
zh: 酒店前面有一家银行。

en: The rates cover all the meals at the hotel.
zh: 费用包括在酒店的所有餐点。

en: The hotel has a swimming pool, tennis courts and the like.
zh: 这家酒店有游泳池、网球场等设施。

en: The hotel has accommodation for one hundred.
zh: 这家旅馆能容纳一百人住宿。

en: The hotel is down there.
zh: 旅馆就在那边。

en: If you want a hotel, look, it's just down there.
zh: 如果你想找旅馆，看，就在那边。

en: Did you book accommodation at the hotel?
zh: 你预订了这家旅馆的住宿吗？

en: The position carries with it an attractive salary.
zh: 这个职位薪水优厚。

en: The boxing match was completely one-sided, one pug was so badly mauled that his manager had to throw in the sponge.
zh: 这场拳击比赛完全是一边倒，一个拳击手被打得很惨，他的经理不得不扔毛巾认输。

en: The bout turned out rough and neither boxer was going to win hands down.

zh: 这件连衣裙很适合你。

en: The dress allured her into the store.
zh: 这件连衣裙吸引她进了商店。

en: How much did you pay for the dress?
zh: 你买这件连衣裙花了多少钱？

en: The dress was most becoming to her.
zh: 这件连衣裙非常适合她。

en: The trunk was too heavy for him to manage.
zh: 这个箱子太重了，他搬不动。

en: The drama brought a lump to my throat.
zh: 这部剧让我哽咽了。

en: The drama differs from the original story.
zh: 这部剧与原著故事有所不同。

en: The tiger laid in the middle of the cage.
zh: 老虎躺在笼子中间。

en: The truck carried a load of furniture.
zh: 卡车运载了一车家具。

en: The load of the truck was in excess of three tons.
zh: 卡车的载重量超过了三吨。

en: The truck is powered by a diesel engine.
zh: 这辆卡车由柴油发动机驱动。

en: It took several hours to clear the mess left from the wreck of the truck and several cars.
zh: 清理卡车和几辆汽车残骸造成的混乱花了几个小时。

en: The truck ran over a boy.
zh: 卡车轧过了一个男孩。

en: The driver was charged with speeding.
zh: 司机被指控超速行驶。

en: Then a good idea came into my mind.
zh: 然后，我脑海中出现了一个好主意。

en: The curtain was rising then.
zh: 那时，幕布正在升起。

en: They were watching the sunset then.
zh: 那时，他们正在看日落。

en: Then they played Jump The Daisies and Run Through The Clover.
zh: 然后他们玩了跳雏菊和穿过三叶草的游戏。

en: Then they picked dandelions and put them in their ears.
zh: 然后他们摘了蒲公英，把它们戴在耳朵上。

en: Then he came to his senses.
zh: 然后他醒悟了。

en: Just then his boss came in and cut him down to size.
zh: 就在那时，他的老板进来了，把他贬得一文不值。

en: I felt like talking to somebody then.
zh: 那时我很想找人聊聊。

en: Then all of a sudden a good idea came to me.
zh: 然后突然间，我冒出了一个好主意。

en: The sun was coming up then.
zh: 那时太阳正在升起。

en: Was the baby crying then?
zh: 那时婴儿在哭吗？

en: I met him then for the first time.
zh: 我那时第一次见到他。

en: Only then did I realize it.
zh: 直到那时我才意识到。

en: It happened that we were in London then.
zh: 碰巧那时我们在伦敦。

en: I was not conscious what in fact I was doing then.
zh: 那时我并没有意识到我实际上在做什么。

en: I was eighteen then.
zh: 那时我十八岁。

en: I could not tell what I should do then.
zh: 那时我不知道该怎么办。

en: Only I was able to jump across the stream then.
zh: 那时只有我能跳过这条小溪。

en: Luck smiled on us then.
zh: 那时幸运之神眷顾了我们。

en: Then I found I had left my wallet at home.
zh: 后来我发现我把钱包忘在家里了。

en: If I had been able to speak English then, I would not have been made fun of.
zh: 如果那时我会说英语，我就不会被嘲笑了。

en: I have got acquainted with him since then.
zh: 从那以后，我和他认识了。

en: By that time he will have seen much of the world.
zh: 到那时，他应该已经见过很多世面了。

en: I was happy then.
zh: 那时我很开心。

en: I realized it only then.
zh: 我直到那时才意识到。

en: At the time, she gave no thought to her mother.
zh: 当时，她没有想到她的母亲。

en: Why didn't you do so at that time?
zh: 你当时为什么不这样做呢？

en: The glaring light is hurtful to the eyes.
zh: 刺眼的光线对眼睛有害。

en: Mr Jones said something then.
zh: 琼斯先生当时说了些什么。

en: Then I felt that my parents really loved me.
zh: 那时我感觉我的父母真的很爱我。

en: Then they played "ring-a-ring-a-rosy" until they were tired and thirsty.
zh: 然后他们玩“玫瑰玫瑰几时开”，直到他们又累又渴。

en: The boy turned around then.
zh: 那个男孩当时转过身来。

en: If you do it that way you won't be mistaken.
zh: 如果你那样做，你就不会出错了。

en: The door opens into the bedroom.
zh: 门通向卧室。

en: The doors fold back.
zh: 门可以折叠起来。

en: The door is sometimes open.
zh: 门有时是开着的。

en: The door opened of itself.
zh: 门自己开了。

en: The door locks automatically.
zh: 门会自动锁上。

en: I found it hard to close the door.
zh: 我发现很难关上门。

en: The door shut of its own accord.
zh: 门自己关上了。

en: The door gives access to the kitchen.
zh: 这扇门通往厨房。

en: You should have seen the program on TV.
zh: 你应该看看电视上的那个节目。

en: The television show was interrupted by a special news report.
zh: 电视节目被一条特别新闻报道打断了。

en: New problems are often brought up on that TV programme.
zh: 那个电视节目经常提出新的问题。

en: I bought the TV from her.
zh: 我从她那里买了电视机。

en: The TV is on the blink.
zh: 这台电视机出毛病了。

en: That television is both big and expensive.
zh: 那台电视机又大又贵。

en: That TV is too loud.
zh: 那台电视声音太大了。

en: The manufacturer of the television set is a Japanese company.
zh: 这家电视机的制造商是一家日本公司。

en: Is there anything wrong with that television?
zh: 那台电视有什么问题吗？

en: The drama on TV was so popular that it stirred up people's interest in the period.
zh: 电视上的那部电视剧非常受欢迎，它激发了人们对那个时期的兴趣。

en: The TV commercial is drawing well.
zh: 那个电视广告效果很好。

en: Nearly a thousand people participated in the demonstration.
zh: 将近一千人参加了示威游行。

en: The department store is always packed with customers.
zh: 这家百货商店总是挤满了顾客。

en: There is a bookstore in front of the department store.
zh: 百货商店前面有一家书店。

en: I found the test difficult.
zh: 我发现这次考试很难。

en: The result of the test brought home to me how little I had learned.
zh: 考试结果让我意识到我学到的东西是多么的少。

en: In my anxiety to pass the test, I studied all night.
zh: 为了通过考试，我焦虑地学习了一整夜。

en: Nobody got zero in that test.
zh: 没有人在那次考试中得零分。

en: For this design house it was an appropriate strategy to introduce even more radical colors into computer production.
zh: 对于这家设计公司来说，将更激进的颜色引入计算机生产是一个合适的策略。

en: Let's listen to the tape.
zh: 我们来听录音带吧。

en: The event has fixed firmly in my mind.
zh: 这件事深深地印在我的脑海里。

en: Will you play the tape?
zh: 你能播放一下录音带吗？

en: The tape recorder has recorded his voice.
zh: 录音机录下了他的声音。

en: The table doesn't take much room.
zh: 这张桌子不占地方。

en: Could you hand me the newspaper on the table?
zh: 你能把桌子上的报纸递给我吗？

en: Will you put the glasses on the table?
zh: 你能把眼镜放在桌子上吗？

en: The data was completely useless.
zh: 这些数据完全没用。

en: The data has been fed into the computer.
zh: 数据已经输入到电脑里了。

en: I didn't mean that.
zh: 我不是那个意思。

en: Where can we go on that tour?
zh: 我们可以参加哪个旅行团？

en: How much is the tour?
zh: 这个旅行团多少钱？

en: Is lunch included in the tour?
zh: 旅行团包含午餐吗？

en: The little girl has a doll in her hands.
zh: 小女孩手里拿着一个洋娃娃。

en: Where did you buy the ticket?
zh: 你在哪里买的票？

en: Who coaches the team?
zh: 谁是这支队伍的教练？

en: The team had advantage over their opponents.
zh: 这支队伍比他们的对手更有优势。

en: The team won the semifinals and advanced to the finals.
zh: 这支队伍赢得了半决赛，晋级决赛。
